mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from board_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into write_board (bnum, writer, bname, catecode, bdes, bimg, thumbimg, cooktime, serving, temperature, difficult, title) values (write_board_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{bname}, #{catecode}, #{bdes}, #{bimg}, #{thumbimg}, #{cooktime}, #{serving}, #{temperature}, #{difficult}, #{title})
mapper.select: select bnum, bname, writer, catecode,bdate, bdes, bimg, thumbimg,title from write_board order by bnum desc

select g.bnum, g.bname, g.catecode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.thumbimg, g.bimg, bdes, bdate, cooktime, serving, temperature, difficult ,title, writer from write_board g inner join board_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update write_board set bname = #{bname}, writer = #{writer}, catecode = #{catecode}, bdes = #{bdes}, bimg = #{bimg}, thumbimg = #{thumbimg}, cooktime = #{cooktime}, serving = #{serving}, temperature = #{temperature}, difficult = #{difficult}, title = #{title} where bnum = ${bnum}
mapper.select: select * from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(write_board pk_write_board) */ rownum rn,bnum,bname,bimg,thumbimg,bdate,title,writer from write_board where bnum>0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) where rn> ((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})
select count(*) from write_board where bnum >0
